name: I Want A Flute!
description:
I Want A Flute is a little game that savuzyelim and I made for UDC Game Jam #25.  You play as a little kid who gets casted out by his friend because he doesn't have a flute and because of that he goes on a journey to find the best flute. It is our first time making a puzzle-platformer and we'd love to hear your comments about the game.

Don't forget to check savuzyelims game Don't Touch The Spikes.

https://savuzyelim.itch.io/dont-touch-the-spikes

Controls :

Movemet : Left And Right Arrow Keys

Jump : Up Arrow Key

Reset Level : R

Skip Level : S
